title: Model Iskra Lawrence Drives Fans Wild With 'Unretouched' Booty Pic
text:
Iskra Lawrence is getting high praise from fans after keeping it completely authentic in her latest bikini shot.

The body-positive role model shared a photo from a recent shoot and revealed to fans it was 100% legit.

Related:

Iskra Lawrence Gets Wild in Snakeskin, And Nothing Else

Iskra Lawrence Shows Off Hot Pink Killer Curves

Iskra Is an Honorary American for 4th of July Bikini Romp

Iskra Lawrence Shows Support for Nike's Plus-Size Mannequins: 'All Bodies Deserve Representation'

Iskra Lawrence Shows Off Xmas Cakes in Miami

"Unretouched and unbothered," she wrote, adding that it was "All my skin in all its unretouched glory."

Iskra posed for the shots during a trip to Italy ... and the strategically placed "P" on her booty is in honor of her boyfriend, Philip Payne.

Fans of Iskra immediately began fawning over her photo and praising the model for keeping it real, and she actually responded to most of the messages!

"You inspire me so much specially [sic] now that I’m going through a hard situation about how I see myself," one fan wrote.

Iskra followed up by giving the girl some further advice.

"take time daily to celebrate all the things your body allows you to do and try to shift the mindset to one of gratitude - it takes time but we are so blessed to have bodies and they deserve our love and appreciation."

Another person wrote, "You're the best. By far the most beautiful girl of our generation. I put you in the same league as Marilyn Monroe. You're just so sensational. Every part of your skin is to die for."

A third fan simply declared Iskra is the "Best model ever."

The 29-year-old British model, who is an ambassador of American Eagle Outfitters lingerie line Aerie, is known for her unedited photos and regularly engaged in photo shoots that undergo no retouching.
